basics.name: Kevin James
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: Kevin James is currently earning his Bachelor of Software Engineering at the University of Waterloo, a 'co-op' degree which requires he work while he gets his degree. This gives him the fantastic opportunity to work at great companies such as TalkIQ, where he is currently building the infrastructure for uncovering insights into phone conversations.

highlights: Integrated logging and monitoring systems across disparate systems
Overhauled pipelined services for migration to new cloud provider

work.companyDescription: File Management and Team Communication Solution
highlights: Released file-share SDK and unidirectional drop box app
Implemented full file search across AeroFS product suite
Optimized system build and packaging process for continuous delivery and failure recovery
Integrated user notifications with OSX notification center
Worked to improve Word Error Rate of speech transcription systems
Developed core customer insight visualizations and dashboards
Refined database queries and performed overhauls to significantly improve overall throughput
Researched automated question-detection and objection tracking
Streamlined development practices for continuous integration
Implemented an automated machine learning system for spam detection
Optimized system to handle millions of concurrent users
Created a natural language processing system which provided insights to help writers expand their work
Designed a machine learning system capable of learning to rank, regression analysis, and unbounded classification
Developed algorithms to sort, categorize, and rank the quality of related content and our own insights

work.companyDescription: Cloud Application and Platform Service Provider
highlights: Wrote a streaming JSON-parser which transforms highly nested JSON files into a standard relational database format
Automated a notoriously difficult installation process

projects.name: jarvis
highlights: Fast, asynchronous processing of messages, tasks, and API requests
Simple plugin system with easy message parsing and async tie-ins

projects.name: league-utils
projects.summary: Collection of League of Legends utilities
highlights: Intelligent itemset generator and installer
Dynamic item value and efficiency API

projects.name: puppet-homebrew
highlights: Most feature-rich and highest rated Homebrew provider on Puppet Forge
